string.value: To help Yulete out, I volunteered to assist him on his research. What can I do for him? I better go see #bYulete#k.
Yulete asked me to eliminate the monsters that stand in his way of conducting experiments. It seems like the monsters he created from the past have come back to haunt him. \n\n#o9300153# #r#a33681##k
I was able to eliminate all the monsters that were of hindrance to Yulete in the lab. Yulete breathed a sigh of relief that he can now use that lab.

What I want you to do is to defeat some monsters in the lab. What do I mean by monsters in the lab? Those... were the monsters I made for experiments a while back, and the Pentagram of Alchemy for controlling those monsters got destroyed... so I want you to defeat those #robstacles to research#k for me. What do you think? Can you do it for me?

Go to the left, and you'll see one three doors that leads to the lab. Enter the last door, and you'll be greeted with a bunch of #rMonster Mutaes#k. All of them are getting in the way of my studies, so if you can eliminate those, I'll be very happy. Good luck.
Hmm... that task must be too difficult for you. Frankly, if you were able to handle Frankenroid, I don't think you'd have trouble with those...
Ah... you must have taken care of those that were in the way of my research. I knew a powerful traveler like you would easily defeat those nagging monsters. Thank you.

I had been unable to use that lab because of those monsters, but thanks to your work, I can finally set foot in there again. This will allow me to be much more efficient in my experiments, which I hope will yield better results.
You haven't eliminated all the #rMonster Mutaes#k yet. It's okay to go slow, but please eliminate them completely.
